gt_metadata.note: Rules Stacking evaluates ONLY redlined clauses against deterministic rules

ground_truth.original_text: caused in whole or in part by any act or omission of Contractor
ground_truth.redline_text: arising out of or relating to the Work, regardless of fault
ground_truth.applicable_rule: Indemnity - Broad-form to Proportionate Fault Amendment
ground_truth.expected_language: to the extent caused by the negligent acts or omissions of Subcontractor, its employees, agents, or anyone for whose acts Subcontractor may be liable

ground_truth.redline_text: Subcontractor shall maintain Cyber Liability Insurance with limits of not less than $2,000,000 per occurrence.

ARTICLE 11 - RESTRICTIVE COVENANTS 11.1 Non-Compete. For a period of two (2) years following completion, Subcontractor shall not perform similar work for any competitor of Contractor within a 100-mile radius.
12.2 Subcontractor shall ensure its workforce complies with all applicable collective bargaining agreements governing the Project site.

ground_truth.original_text: Neither party shall be liable to the other for any consequential, indirect, incidental, special, or punitive damages arising out of or relating to this Subcontract
ground_truth.redline_text: Subcontractor shall be liable for all consequential, indirect, incidental, special damages, lost profits, and loss of business opportunity arising from any breach or delay
ground_truth.applicable_rule: Consequential Damages - Exposure to Mutual Waiver Amendment
ground_truth.expected_language: Neither party shall be liable to the other for any consequential, indirect, incidental, special, or punitive damages arising out of or relating to this Agreement.

ground_truth.redline_text: ARTICLE 9 - PERSONAL GUARANTEE The principals, owners, and officers of Subcontractor hereby personally and unconditionally guarantee full payment and performance of all obligations under this Agreement.
, whether caused in whole or in part by the negligence of Contractor or any Indemnified Party
ground_truth.applicable_rule: Indemnity - Broad-form to Proportionate Fault Amendment

ground_truth.original_text: Subcontractor shall only be liable for liquidated damages to the extent Contractor is assessed such damages by Owner under the Prime Contract and then only to the extent of Subcontractor's proportionate share attributable to its fault
ground_truth.redline_text: Subcontractor shall pay to Contractor as liquidated damages, and not as a penalty, the sum of $3,500 per calendar day for each day that the Work remains incomplete after the scheduled completion date
ground_truth.applicable_rule: Liquidated Damages - Direct to Pass-through Amendment
ground_truth.expected_language: Subcontractor shall only be liable for liquidated damages to the extent Contractor is assessed such damages by Owner under the Prime Contract and then only to the extent of Subcontractor's proportionate share attributable to its fault.

ground_truth.redline_text: 3.3 MOST FAVORED NATIONS. Subcontractor represents and warrants that the pricing herein is no less favorable than pricing offered to any other customer for similar work.
13.4 Subcontractor acknowledges receipt of the Project Labor Agreement attached as Exhibit J and agrees to comply with all provisions thereof and shall execute a Letter of Assent.
6.4 Subcontractor shall name Contractor as alternate employer under Workers' Compensation policy per WC 00 03 01 A endorsement.

ground_truth.original_text: Certificates of Insurance and copies of endorsements evidencing the required coverages
ground_truth.redline_text: certified copies of complete insurance policies within 10 days of execution
ground_truth.expected_language: Certificates of Insurance and copies of endorsements evidencing the required coverages

ground_truth.redline_text: 12.2 VACCINATION REQUIREMENTS. All Subcontractor personnel working on the Project site shall provide proof of COVID-19 vaccination. Unvaccinated workers shall not be permitted on site.
